column4: Hi Guys/Ladies, I've installed Ubuntu 7.10 on my sons (winXP machine), i let ubuntu create partition... Problem is i don't appear to have rights to install anything .... saying something about i386 bla bla ... is there a fix for this.... i'm also a linux newbee
start the package manager this way:    sudo synaptic
that will give the package manager admin privileges
same with apt-get, or any of the various package management CLI and GUI utilities
